# calcite-position

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property          | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                                                                     | Type                                  | Default     |
| ----------------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `placement`       | `placement` | Determines where the element will be displayed. anchor: dynamically above or below based on how close trigger is to top or bottom of window. leading: trailing: | `"anchor" \| "leading" \| "trailing"` | `undefined` |
| `positionElement` | --          | HTMLElement used to position this element according to the placement.                                                                                           | `HTMLElement`                         | `undefined` |
